title: The Goddess of the Hunt: The affairs of the gods
description: Intelligent, brave and steadfast, Brasus has all the qualities to succeed, however, the fates spin the lives of mortals to their own liking and Brasusâ€™ life is no different. After his raiding party gets drawn into an ambush, the Dacian warrior finds the roles reversed, turning from predator to prey. Now, as he tries to elude his pursuers and survive in an inhospitable land, Brasus enters a mysterious forest. Unknown to him, however, he is already stalked by an ancient hunter and unfortunately for him she is in a playful mood.   This book is for sale to ADULT AUDIENCES ONLY. It contains mature content that may be considered offensive by some readers.
author: Stefan A.
